---
title: "Dose-Response Curves"
output: html_document
params:
  drm_obj: NA
  cex: NA
  lwd: NA
  log_scale: NA
  x_upper: NA
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(drc)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
summary(params$drm_obj)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=10}
plot(params$drm_obj, 
     col = TRUE, 
     log = params$log_scale,
     cex = params$cex,
     cex.lab = params$cex,
     cex.axis = params$cex,
     lwd = params$lwd,
     xlim = params$x_upper)
```
